items.title: OFA On-Camera Acting
items.description: On-camera scene study and acting classes in the Plaza District. First class free.

items.title: The Actor Factory
items.description: Acting studio in Norman since 2009. Adult and young performer classes: on-camera, audition for film & TV, scene work, demo reel camps. In-person and online.

items.title: Cody Mayo Studios
items.description: Film and TV acting conservatory in Tulsa. Adult and young actor classes, improv, private coaching, self-tape services. Studio Row, 317 S. Trenton Ave.

items.title: 1907 Stunts by Justin Parks
items.description: Stunt training and coordination. Justin Parks – professional stunt performer and instructor.

items.title: Lyric Theatre of Oklahoma
items.description: Oklahoma's official state theatre. Professional theatre in the Plaza District; also performs at Civic Center Music Hall. Thelma Gaylord Academy offers training.

items.title: Carpenter Square Theatre
items.description: Year-round live theatre at 1009 W. Reno. Award-winning mix of modern works, comedy classics, and musicals. Intimate 120-seat venue with lobby art gallery.

items.title: Jewel Box Theatre
items.description: Longest continuously operating theatre in Oklahoma (since 1911). Six productions annually including plays and musicals. 301 NW 36th St.

items.title: Oklahoma Shakespeare
items.description: Oklahoma's home for classical theatre in the Paseo Arts District. Outdoor amphitheater and Black Box indoor theatre. Year-round season, student matinees, young company camps.

items.title: 3rd Act Theatre Company
items.description: Community theatre at The Shoppes at NorthPark (12040 N May Ave). Diverse, inclusive casting. Quality theatre for Quail Creek and surrounding areas.

items.title: World Stage Theatre Company
items.description: Community theatre at 1130 S. Harvard. AACT and OCTA member. Timeless and relevant stories; Season 8 (2025–2026) includes Lord of the Flies, For Colored Girls, and more.

items.title: American Theatre Company
items.description: Community theatre since 1970 at 3306 Charles Page Blvd. Four-play season, dinner theatre, Black Box, youth education, and local playwright opportunities.

items.title: The Tabb Agency
items.description: Oklahoma's leading talent agency for actors, models, and artists in film, TV, and print. Represents adults, youth, families, voiceover, and hair/makeup artists.

items.title: Reel Talent Studio
items.description: Talent agency in Tulsa serving Oklahoma and the region. Film, TV, and commercial representation for adults, teens, kids, and voice-over. Team-focused approach.

items.title: Linda Layman Agency
items.description: Model and talent agency in Tulsa for over 50 years. Books actors, kids, and models for TV, print, film, and runway.

items.title: RANGE 405
items.description: Prop firearms and armorer services for film in Oklahoma. Extensive inventory of period and modern prop guns; professional armorer and actor weapons training; armorers available on set.
